verbs.description: While [ARG1: the progressive left] [V: was] [ARG2: busy whining over Trump detaining illegal alien adults at the border] , a federal judge just let a nine - times deportee with a slew of drug convictions and an outstanding domestic abuse charge go free on bail .

While the progressive left was busy whining over [ARG0: Trump] [V: detaining] [ARG1: illegal alien adults] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] , a federal judge just let a nine - times deportee with a slew of drug convictions and an outstanding domestic abuse charge go free on bail .

[ARGM-TMP: While the progressive left was busy whining over Trump detaining illegal alien adults at the border] , [ARG0: a federal judge] [ARGM-TMP: just] [V: let] [ARG1: a nine - times deportee with a slew of drug convictions and an outstanding domestic abuse charge go free on bail] .

While the progressive left was busy whining over Trump detaining illegal alien adults at the border , a federal judge just let [ARG1: a nine - times deportee with a slew of drug convictions and an outstanding domestic abuse charge] [V: go] [ARG2: free] [ARGM-MNR: on bail] .
